title: Idre Fjäll
Start_welcome_to_sub_title: Thank you for choosing Idre. We wish you a wonderful and memorable stay.
Start_checkin: Begin check-in by clicking the button below.
Start_checkin_sub: This will open the camera; point the camera at the QR code on the inside of the front door.
Start_checkout: Begin checkout by clicking the button below.
Start_checkout_sub: This outlines the checkout process and includes a few steps for you to complete as a guest.
Checkin_form_fill: Take your time to fill out the form below.
Checkout_sub_title: Here you will find useful tips, information, and checklists for departure.
Thanks_you_are_now_checkedin: Thank you, you are now checked in
Thanks_for_choosing: Thank you for choosing Idre Fjäll.
Thanks_you_are_now_checkedout: Thank you, you are now checked out
We need your permission to show the came: We need your permission to show the camera.
